players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Alice, why did you start speaking but not finish? What were you going to say?"
Diana: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night. We need to vote her out now."
You: "Alice: I don't know why Diana would lie about her investigation. I haven't done anything suspicious. Maybe she's trying to deflect suspicion from the real mafia."
Diana: "Alice is lying to protect herself. As the detective, I have no reason to lie and risking my life is not worth it. Town, please trust me and vote Alice out now."
Charlie: "I trust Diana's investigation. Alice is the mafioso. Let's vote her out."
